(1) ADMISSIBILITY BOUND: r >= 3j+2 correctly stated. Equivalence j <= (r-2)/3 verified: at r=3j+2, (r-2)/3 = 3j/3 = j. Examples (j=1->r>=5, j=3->r>=11, j=5->r>=17) match child 1.4.3.

(2) REALITY OF q-3j SYMBOLS: Correct. [n]_q = sin(n*pi/r)/sin(pi/r) > 0 for 1<=n<r. Under r>=3j+2, all n in Racah formula satisfy n<=3j+1<r, so all [n]_q positive real, all quantum factorials positive real, Delta(j,j,j) positive real.

(3) FAILURE MODE: Precise. [3j+1]_q! contains [r]_q=0 when r<=3j+1. Confirmed by child 1.4.4 counterexample j=3, r=9.

(4) REGIME I ESTABLISHED: Consistent with validated child 1.2.

(5) REGIME II CONJECTURAL: Correctly labeled, cites Taylor-Woodward 2005 open conjecture. Consistent with validated child 1.3.

(6) REGIME III MIXED STATUS: No overclaiming. BLM-to-TV stated as open problem. References 1.4.2, 1.4.4.

(7) SYNTHESIS: All four children 1.1-1.4 correctly referenced with epistemic qualifiers.

(8) EPISTEMIC LABELS: Decreasing status correctly applied across regimes.

(9) SUSY: {Q,Q^dag}>=0 tautological for any Q on Hilbert space -- correct.

VERDICT: Node 1 statement is MATHEMATICALLY SOUND. Formal acceptance blocked only by framework constraint (child 1.4 pending due to child 1.4.4 having unresolved note/minor challenges, none blocking). No mathematical errors found in the root synthesis.
